Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Reroute at 59th/Lawndale-Central Park
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 59th, Kedzie, 63rd, Pulaski and 59th due to street blockage near 59th/Lawndale-Central Park

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#59 59th/61st  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 59th, Kedzie, 63rd, Pulaski, and 59th due to street blockage near 59th/Lawndale-Central Park

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Westbound #12 RooseveltTemporary West-bound Reroute near Roosevelt/Indepedence
ShortDescription: Westbound 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Independence, Congress and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Independence, Congress, Pulaski, Roosevelt, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Roosevelt/Independence.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 88th/Buffalo
ShortDescription: Eastbound 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Lake Shore Drive, Mackinaw and 91st street due to, street blockage near 88th/Buffalo.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Lake Shore Drive, Mackinaw and 91st street due to, street blockage near 88th/Buffalo.
